description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Number of lines per page varies. Traces of numbering of the quires (see fol. 18: "Thāni ʻashar").
abstract: Collection of texts and ijāzāt in several hands on various types of paper. The ms. comprises the signature of Ṣadr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Maydūmī (d. 1353, see fol. 20b and 22b), Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jarādiqī (d. 1457, fol. 28b) and Muḥammad ibn Mūsá ibn ʻUmrān (d. 1469), and a text copied in the handwriting of Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sakhawī (d. 1497, fol. 25b). At least one text indicates a Damascene provenance (see fol. 30a). The ms. was endowed as waqf to the Jāmiʻ al-Azhar by Muḥammad al-Kaffawī (see fol. 31b).
contents: 1. fol. 1a-3b: Juzʼ fīhi muntaqá min Dhamm al-kalām lil-Harawī wa-huwa mā waqaʻa fīhi min al-Jāmiʻ lil-ḥāfiẓ Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
2. fol. 5a-23b: Juzʼ fīhi nuskhat Ibrāhīm ibn Saʻd ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Ibn ʻAwf al-Zuhrī.
3. fol. 24a-25b: [Collection of ḥadīths] / ʻUmar ibn raslān al-Bulqīnī.
4. fol. 26a-30a: Thabat al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Ṣafī al-Miṣrī.
5. fol. 31a-44a: al-Muhadhdhab fī-mā waqaʻa fī al-Qurʼān min al-muʻarrab / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.

6. fol. 46b: [Ijāzah for Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Aḥmad, dated [Jerusalem], al-Masjid al-Aqsá, at Bāb al-Ḥadīd, in the last decade of Ramaḍān 87-(?) and on 9 Muḥarram 873, signed by Muḥammad ibn Mūsá ibn ʻUmrān al-Maqarrī al-Ḥanafī al-Ghazzī thumma al-Maqdisī].
7. fol. 47b-48b: [Sawād of a text starting with: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā (daʻānā) ilá baytihi al-maḥjūj"].
8. fol. 49b: [Short text transmitted by al-Sharīf Abū al-Ṭayyib from al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah Sirāj al-Dīn al-Bulqīnī].

9. fol. 50a-56b: [Verses of poetry, some attributed to al-Ṣāliḥ Abū Bakr al-Ḥalabī al-Bisṭāmī, Shaykh al-Madarasah al-Ṭūlūnīyah in Jerusalem (al-Quds), as a conclusion to the Qasīdat al-Burdah (see fol. 53a) and al-Kamālī Abū al-Maʻālī ibn Abī Sharīf].
extent: i, 56, i leaves : paper ; 173 x 133 mm. bound to 197 x 145 mm.
subject: Ibn ʻUmrān, Muḥammad ibn Mūsá, 1392-1469
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
